Name: Flask of Saint Minas
Description: The flask, or bottle, has a narrow mouth and a narrow cylindrical neck. The body is circular and flattened. On either side of the body, Saint Minas is portrayed standing in prayer. He wears a cloak and at his feet two camels are kneeling. There are two crosses around the saint's head in the upper part of the scene. The whole scene is surrounded by two circles, one of which is shown in raised relief, while the other is made up of dots.
